Blurb_DonateText:
Welcome to Zephod.co.uk, all the games available and in development from this site are made entirely by people with a passion for these types of games. Please support us by donating what you feel the games are worth to you via PayPal below!

From the Zephod.co.uk team we thank you in advance for your generosity!
